events.title: Tafseer of Surah Yusuf
events.description: Join our Imam for an in-depth exploration of Surah Yusuf, uncovering its timeless lessons, spiritual insights, and practical guidance for our daily lives.

events.title: Weekly Hadith Circle
events.description: A weekly gathering to study authentic Hadith with Maulana Abdul Mobeen. Learn the sayings and traditions of Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) and their application in modern life.

events.title: Iqraa Series
events.description: Bi-weekly Islamic educational series with Al Yusra focusing on Quranic understanding, Islamic knowledge, and spiritual development.
